text: Unclear yellow color, small white head. Aromas of citrus, hay, salt and malt. Slight bitter hop taste leading to a bitter finish. Pretty cool.
Flaska i 4-pack från SB. Ljusgul med vitt skum. Syrlig tropisk doft. Lätt i smaken med frisk syrlighet från havtornen.

(Bottle) Hazy golden colour with frothy, off-white head. Fruity nose with notes of citrus, tropical fruit, sea buckthorn, cloudberries and white bread. Fruity, spicy taste with tropical fruit, pineapple, citrus, sea buckthorn, cloudberries and a certain citric bitterness in the finish. Medium body, mainly dry. Fresh and tasty, with a nice fruit character. Quite nice.

Bottle courtesy of FräuleinEm. Pours cloudy golden with a very small offwhite head that doesnt leave any trace while quickly dissipating. Smell is tiny malty and fruity with white bread, caramel, cloudberries, sea-buckthorn, moist grass, lemon zest and hints of moist soil and moss. Taste is tiny sweet, tiny bitter, fruity and tiny herbal with white bread, grapefruit, sea-buckthorn, moist grass, moist green herbs and lemon zest. Mouthfeel is soft, round, tiny astringent, tiny fruity tart and light to medium bodied. Finish is bitter with white bread, sea-buckthorn, moist grass, moist green herbs, minerals and lemon zest. Kind works Which I had opened this fresh but it still works well
330 ml bottle at Tullen, Svingeln. Pours amber with white head. Smell is fresh citrus. Taste is citrus and floral hops. Low bitterness and a bit fresh sourness.

Sweet fruity, somewhat citrusy aroma. Hazy ornange white head. Nice refreshing citrusy taste that feels just a little bit tart. Bitterness is there just enough to give balance but does not take attention from the fruitiness. Malty sweetness is there as well. Medium body, creamy texture. It is very nice but it feels like you really need to compliment it with food, you get a feeling of lacking something

330ml brown bottle, pours opaque orange with a small white head, that reduced quickly leaving no lacing. Aroma of sea-buckthorn, lemons, oranges and a hint of pineapple. Flavour of sea-buckthorn, grapefruit, lemons, oranges, pineapple and wheat bread. Taste is light sweet and medium bitter. Palate is medium bodied, soft texture and average carbonation. An interesting unique brew, sea-buckthorn is dominating the flavour, pleasant at first but becomes a bit too much by the time you finished the bottle.

Aroma: Smelling of sweet bread, oranges, and pine.Appearance: A clouded brass colored beer. A white head with small lacing and some curtains.Taste: Tasting bread, orange, marmalade, pine soap and grape-fruit peel.Palate: Medium carbonation, a soft texture. A medium body with a dry finish.Overall: The best one in the series, the seabuckthorn makes it fresh and tasty.Note: Bottle 330 ml at home. Reviewed 2014-03-09.
Ljusgul grumlig med litet skum som försvinner snabbt. Citrus och humlig i både doft och smak! Ganska besk men bättre än väntat!

Bottle shared at the chriso 2013 pre-GBBF shindig - London. Pours lightly hazy gold with a fine white froth crown. Some interesting pear and mango notes in this one. Light to medium bodied with fine carbonation. Moderate dry fruits to finish. OK. Drinkable stuff.
@ Havregatan. Flaska från Systembolaget (4-pack 110:-). Frisk och fruktig, söt, syrlig, citrus, något torr och sträv, medelfyllig. Avslutningen är fruktig och något torr.

Bottle @ Chrisos Pre-GBBF Shindig. The pours gold with a small head. The nose is pretty herbal. Honeyed apple, some sage and rose hip. The taste is similar. Grassy herbs. Lemon and more honeyed apple. Light body, soft carbonation. Good.

The best aroma of the #4 beer. Nice mouth feel and above average taste. 
It Would be Nice with fruity food.

33 cl bottle from Systembolaget in Mölndal a little while back. From a 4-pack of different ones.BB 2014-04-03. Also marked 561.Sampled on December 31, 2013.Hazy to cloudy golden color, small white head. Sweet, sugary, berries, apricots, fruity, meat like, acidic, sulfur scent. Acidic, fruity, berry, sugary taste. Mineral, acidic, brett like aftertaste. Fizzy mouthfeel, low bitterness. All in all a bit cloying, nothing I see myself getting one more bottle of.

Slightly hazy yellow liquid, big white head. Quite hoppy citrus aroma, at least for the style. Medium bitter and dry, slightly salty finish. Medium carbonation. Feels more like an APA than a cream ale but the buckthorn does shine through.

How: Bottle.
Where: Systembolaget.
Appearance: Golden colour with a white head.
Aroma: Fruit, spices, berries.
Body: Medium body and carbonation.
Flavour: Berries, hops, floral, nectar, fruit.
Bottle. Notes of sour berries in aroma. Taste is sour, refreshing, berry and has a small forresty bitterness in the end.

Bottle @SBWF 2013
Hazy yellow color, small steady white head. Evident seabuckthorn berry aroma. Medium-bodied. Slightly tart seabuckthorn flavor, wheaty feeling. Very nice seabuckthorn tartness in the aftertaste too.

Bottle from the 4pack. 
Pours hazy golden with a compact white head. 
Aroma of fruity gum. Tart fruity taste like a light wild ale.
Tämligen frisk i smaken, samtidigt ganska söt. En speciell öl, som helt. Inte en som jag kommer sakna.

Bottle 330ml. @ [ (chriso Pre-GBBF Shindig) by chriso - London ].Unclear medium yellow colour with a average, frothy, good lacing, mostly diminishing, white head. Aroma is moderate malty, pale malt, tart, fruity - berry - sea-buckthorn. Flavour is moderate sweet and light to light light moderate acidic with a long duration, tart, berry -fruity, sea-buckthorn. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft. [20130810]

[email protected]/* <![CDATA[ */!function(t,e,r,n,c,a,p){try{t=document.currentScript||function(){for(t=document.getElementsByTagName('script'),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute('data-cfhash'))return t[e]}();if(t&&(c=t.previousSibling)){p=t.parentNode;if(a=c.getAttribute('data-cfemail')){for(e='',r='0x'+a.substr(0,2)|0,n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)e+='%'+('0'+('0x'+a.substr(n,2)^r).toString(16)).slice(-2);p.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(decodeURIComponent(e)),c)}p.removeChild(t)}}catch(u){}}()/* ]]> */ Hazy golden colour, small white head. Aroma is tart sea buckthorn with some mild sweet maltiness. Flavour is sea buckthorn, quite interesting hop profile as well as mild floral and nectary notes. Balanced, but the sea bunchthorn comes in just a wee bit too strongly.

Bottle at Chrisos Pre-GBBF Shindig 2013, 10/08/13. Cream ale tick! Juicy fruit aroma, bubble gum. Cloudy yellow with a white halo head. Clean bitterness in the flavour, fruity squishy fruit hop character. Slight chalk and lemon rind.

Bottle, 33cl - Hazy blond beer with a small white head. Aroma is fruity with notes of buckthorn, red berries, citrus and spices. Flavor is spicy with notes of citrus, melon, berries and yeast. Surprisingly good but this is really not a cream ale.
Bottle (Stockholm Beer Festival 2013) - Golden in colour. Peach, buckthorn, toffee and grapefruit in the aroma. Tangy and sweet taste with honey, buckthorn and peach. The finish is quite dry.
330 ml bottle. Slightly hazy golden with white head. Aroma fruity with yeast and citrus. Taste is lemon, citrus, slight wood and yeast. Very refreshing

13-SEP-2013, bottle @Ulkloebben tasting, @Erik.
Blind with #1, #2, #3.
Hazy golden with low white head.
Aroma is arm pit, brett? Fruity/berry stuff and spice.
Taste is fruity/berry - Seabuckthorn - now that I know it.
A little tart. Medium body, soft carbonation. Short taste. Special but no thanks.
Bottle at Yesprs - Thanks. Cloudy yellow - white head. Havtorn (Seabuckthorn), hoppy aroma, acid notes, orange, citrus, fruity, light to medium malty, sweet dessert beer....

Bottle from Systembolaget. 

Hazy golden/orange with a white head. Aroma and taste of fruit, citrus, some light berries, light yeast and malt. Quite refreshing and easy to drink.

Bottle @ yespr. Pours a hazy yellow color with a white head. Has a fruity hoppy spicy sea buckthorn aroma. Fruity malty spicy hoppy bitter sea buckthorn flavor. Has a fruity malty spicy hoppy bitter sea buckthorn finish.

Bottle at Chrisos Pre-GBBF Shindig 2013, 10/08/13. 
Hazed golden amber with a thin off white head.
Nose is zesty orange, light tropical fruits, orange sherbet.
Taste comprises peach, orange pith, grass.
Medium bodied, fine carbonation, dry finish.
Nice enough drop - best of the 4 Eriks!
user_location: Hazlemere, the lower Xhitlerns, Buckinghamshire, ENGLAND

text: Bottle. Hazy golden liquid with small to medium white head. Aroma of tangerine, lemon peel, earth, bread and perfume. Taste is light sweet and light bitter with notes of tangerine, lemon peel and bread. Medium bodied with medium carbonaiton. Quite nice.

Scent of a lot of yeast. The taste is really good with a bit of citrus. Citrus in the aftertaste as well. This beer was ritktigt good and creamy. This beer must only try. Follow me @ Kung av öl @ Facebook for more pictures and ratings.

Bottle from SB cons 2013-08-27 Göteborg
AR: sweet and sour berries kompott, sea - buckthorn when poured - nice
AP: hazy golden, frothy deminishing white head
F: sea buckthorn, lemon, dry and sweet, grape fruit bitternees, rich carbonation, a bit hollow feeling,... the aroma is top notch, that is why the higher rating

10th August 2013ChrisOs Pre GBBF Are You Scottish? tasting. Light haze on this gold beer. Little white head. Light semi dry palate. Light floral flavour and light lemon led dried fruits. Light dry finish with a lemony floral linger.

@basunen: trevlig doft av havtorn. Smaken är lite blekare med en tydlig bitterhet och ganska sträv eftersmak. Speciell og lite halvgod. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Det här var rätt bra, mycket frisk smak av citrus och blommor. Kroppen är kanske i minsta laget men balansen och finessen är det inget fel på.

Pours a cloudy golden with almost no head. Aroma is passionfruit, lychee, citrus, yeast, pine. Taste is passionfruit, lychee, grapefruit, orange, bread, musk. Aftertaste is somewhat tart and citrusy. By far the best of the Jessica Heidrich / Mathias Dahlgren collabs!

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle at Chrisos Pre-GBBF Shindig 2013. It pours hazy golden with a small white head. The nose is doughy, spice, earth, orange, light sherbet, hay and faint smoke. The taste is orange, peachy, ripe fruit, spice, earth, light herbal and dough with a dry finish. Medium body and moderate carbonation. OK, but Im pretty bored of these S:t Eriks herbal beers by #4....
Bottle from Systembolaget. Nice havtorn aroma and taste. Some bitterness. Probably the best of the four beers in the limited edition box.
Bottle acquired from Systembolaget. Unclear with small, white head. Citrus, mango and peach.
Bottled, from Systembolaget.  Cloudy golden, creamy head. Fruity salty nose. Mid sweet with light body and clean, rounded mouthfeel. Ripe fruits and herbal spices, marked bitter finish.

Bottle from Systembolaget. Fruity and fresh smell with a berry aroma that goes towards cloud berries and passion fruit. Similar taste but I also get some hops. Sweeter and thicker body then the other three. This one I could drink more of.
Skulle vara den bästa i serien, vet inte riktigt. Ljus grumlig, viss sötma i aroman. Citrus. Rätt lik en weissbier.

Muddy light blond color. The aroma is chaotic, but it has fruits (peach, cloudberry), hay, light animal, glue. Dirty yeasty flavor with some peachy fruitiness, correct bitterness.The only drinkable of the lot.

Bottled from Systembolaget
Hazy golden with a small, white head. 
Slightly mashy aroma. Earthy notes with some sweetish berries. 
Bready maltiness in the flavour with mashy notes. Light to medium bitterness. Some citric flavours.
Ljus och lite grumlig. Påminner lite om min egen havtornsöl, men min vill jag minnas som bättre. Vill också gärna tro att jag var först med den idén
Bottle. A bit hazy golden beer with minimal head. Fruity aroma with a lot of sea bucktorn hints. Similar flavour with nice sourish notes.

Bottle from Systembolaget. Pale golden beer with a small offwhite head. Fruity aroma, sourish, ses buckthorn, citrus, mango, pine needles, herbal notes. Citrus flavor, sea buckthorn, woody, biscuits, earthy notes, herbal, leather notes, floral, pine needles, spicy, hay, sourish. Sourish finish with sea buckthorn, citrus and woods. Not anything like your average beer, but I like this.

Bottled. Yellow coloured. Unclear. Dense off white head. Aroma: citrus, sweetness, fruits and some flowers. Flavour. Herbs, flowers, citurs, sweetness, Medium bodied. Ends sweet and citric with a light bitter touch.

Bottle at yespr.
Hazy golden coloured with a small white head.
Fruity aroma of sea buck-thorn and berries.
Fruity flavour of sea buck-thorn, berries and hops.
Hoppy finish.
Bottled. An unclear yellow beer with a white head? The aroma has notes of sea buckthorn. The flavor is sweet with notes of malt and sea buckthorn, leading to a dry finish.

Flaska från SB. Gulorange, disig vätska, lågt skum. Stor syrlig doft av havtorn, rabarber, örter och jäst. Drar lite åt lambichållet. Smak är friskt syrlig, torr, bärig med mycket havtorn, örtig beska. Bra balans, snygg smakbild och mycket havtorn. En perfekt sommardryck. Riktigt gott.
cloudy yellow, small white head. aroma sort of reminds me of cat pee, with a bitter herbal note. flavor is malty ,flowery, herbal, slightly flowery.
33 cl bottle. Pours hazy pale yellow with a small white head. Aroma is citrusy, berry fruity and sweet impression. Peachy, citrusy and light greasy. Bitter and citrusy finish.
